2015 janawari 09 wanida ewakata siti agamathiwarayawa thanathurena paha karamin wipaksha nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha agamathiwaraya lesa pathkirima aandukrama wyawasthawata patahani bawa prajathanthrawadaya pilibandawa ha apage aandukrama wyawasthawa pilibanda sarala awabodhayak athi eta garu karana samage mathaya wiya.ee sambandhayen kotharam karunu idiripath kalada ,eki nithiwirodhi pathkirima sidukala janadhipathiwaraya ho ema nirlajjitha pathwima labagath agamathiwaraya sema me rate prajathanthrawadaya wenuwen kibul kandulu helana eeniya siwil sanwidhana hasiruneda kisiwak sidu nowu ganataya.

rate jathika aarakshawa saha janathawage ayithiwasikam rakinna wyawasthawen ohuta dila thiyena balaya kriyathmaka nokara rukadayak bawata pathwi sitima ganayi.' 'ee nisa rate thibena deshapalana wiyawula nisa me janadhipathi kramaya ahosi kaloth me rata sampurnayenma winasha wi yanawa.

me wana wita hodin kriyathmaka wana china ha pakisthanu welada katayuthu idiriyedi afganisthanayada sambandha karaganimin thawath pululwa ha shakthimathwa pawathwa ganime aramunin chinaya pakisthanaya ha afganisthanaya yana ratawal widesha amathiwarunge sahabhagithwayen me dinawala chinaye bijinhidi pawathwe.

mema madhyawediyage athurudan wima sambandhayen wimarshanaya sidukaranu labana thurki baladharin sadahan kale sawudi thanapathi karyalaya thuladi jamal kagoshi ghathanaya kara athi bawath siduwimata adala widiyo saha handa patayak siya bharaye athi bawayi.

mama akamathima deshapaluwa meka thamayi meya gana kawurath dannawa ne yana yana thana ada gena nanna dakshayi ne .dan eya golloth akamathima kawuda kiyala danna
api ee moda sinhayawa nathuwa lassanata pelapaliye giya.
snodan nisa samaja madyata suyan waranayak !”
